phrases: The S Class Wizard Advancement Exam has finally begun!
The first test is to choose a battle route,
But Natsu's opponent was Gildarts, right off the bat!
It was tough going, but that is'because I held back a little.
Are you sure it is okay for us to follow them there?
We are just going to watch.
Even though I was so dead-set against it, she...
I have heard quite a lot about you from Mystogan!
I want to know what the snow tastes like.
Would you lend me a hand?
Is that any attitude to have when asking favors?!
When I want to know something,
I have a tendency to get obsessed about it.
With your power, I can get to know the world of an S Class wizard.
I want to know what the river is like in winter.
Do not go along with this weirdo!
But he does not seem like a bad person.
I was not able to return all the kindness Mystogan showed me at all...
But that was more just how things turned out...
It was not about how I felt...
And in the end, she decided to help Mest in Mystogan's stead.
And that is why you have not spoken this past week.
She is a lot more stubborn than she looks.
I do not care really about this Mest guy.
It is the exam as a whole I have a really bad feeling about.
Your power to see the future, is it?
It is too fragmented, so I cannot say.
I am curious about this Mest fellow.
I want to know your abilities.
Mest-san, they are going to attack!
Of all the people, it is Mest and Wendy we get to fight with...
That is some force, all right...
All that is left is Wendy!
I are not going to hold back, either!
I am not even eating them, but just watching makes my mouth pucker up!
Is this some kind of transmission magic?
Elsewhere, the pair of Evergreen and Elfman have engaged Mirajane.
As long as I do not look you in the eyes, that magic does not work!
And can you dodge these while looking away?
You are serious about this, I see.
I will blow the both of you away, Evergreen.
I will tell you something you might want to know.
I did not realize those guys would be so strong...
But, I am going to follow in Mystogan's footsteps!
While you were unconscious, Gray-san and Loke-san went on ahead.
So this year's no good, either?
It is because I was not any help...
Even though I decided to try as hard as I could...
Although if Natsu, for example, lost against Fried in the first test,
I would feel better about what is coming up.
Well, Cana might be a tough one.
There is no such thing as an easy path to becoming an S Class wizard.
I was just thinking we did well by beating Mest...
I thought he was stronger before.
It is that we have gotten stronger.
Have I fought with him before?
Mest said that he got pretty far in last year's exam...
Who was his partner last time?
I can tell something is hazy about my memories of Mest.
It is like my memories of Mest are broken off somewhere.
I figured you two would pass the first test!
We were lucky and got the peaceful route.
I did not get to smack anyone!
So we are the only ones to pass the first exam?
Now then, I think everyone is here.
I will now announce the results, to date.
Cana and Lucy defeated Fried and Bickslow in battle, and passed through!
Natsu and Happy managed to get past Gildarts somehow, and passed through!
You have got to be kiddin' me!
I did not do anything, though.
Levy and Gajeel passed through the peaceful route with good luck!
You are sayin' I got good luck?!
Gray and Loke defeated Mest and Wendy in battle, and passed through!
Juvia and Lisanna hit upon... her.
That female knight who knows not the meaning of holding back!
Then all that is left is Elfman and Evergreen.
But if we consider what is left, they must have taken the route...
Well, I could still have won.
We have passed through the first test!
Let us just say we managed to find an opening to slip through.
What the heck did they do, I wonder?
Natsu and Happy, Gray and Loke,
Levy and Gajeel, Cana and Lucy,
Now we will begin the second test!
Natsu, how long are you going to sulk?
How little do you take him for?
Get out there and become an S Class wizard, Natsu.
Let us fight and see just who will become an S Class wizard!
You, especially, I are not going to lose to.
As a Man, I will take on that challenge!
I am going to make Cana S Class, no matter what!
Even if I am fighting you, Lucy, I will not hold back.
Does not look good for those two.
Now then, I will announce the details for the second test of the S Class Wizard Advancement Exam!
The second test is searching for the grave of Mavis, our founding Guild Master.
I will be waiting at Mavis's grave.
How long are you going to stay like that?
Do you know why this island is called Fairy Tail's Holy Ground?
Because it is where its founding Guild Master, Mavis, rests.
This island is usually hidden by a powerful barrier.
No matter what magic you use, you would not be able to find it, I hear.
And that is because there is more here than just Mavis's grave.
Apparently, a big secret relating to Fairy Tail is hidden on this island.
I mean, Mystogan, tried to avoid contact with the people of this world.
I heard that he would put everyone to sleep so as not to show his face in the guild.
It is difficult for me to think he would take on a disciple.
What are you trying to say?
It is a pretty out-there hypothesis, however...
Is Mest really a member of the guild?
To become S class, this are not nothing!
Way to put on a brave face!
Bad luck for the ones who showed up in front of Natsu.
Tell me where the grave of the founding master is!
But, having us search for a grave without even a hint...
This second test might be harder than we thought.
Was not this island shaped like this?
That top seem suspicious to you?
I knew partnering with you was the right choice!
This is the examiner's base on Tenroujima.
Elfman and Evergreen are getting married?
And while I was still blanked out, they landed some attacks.
And wait, when did those two start...
I think it was just a plan to throw me off guard.
Guess I have a long way to go.
Is it really just a plan?
I do not really see it.
I mean, if they get married and have a kid...
It is cute the way you imagined it.
They are kind of birds of a feather, actually.
By the way, where is Fried?
They went back to the guild with Gildarts.
I wish I could have seen him off.
Anyway, where did Mest and Wendy go?
Did they forget the meeting place?
I did not meet him in Edolas, so I do not know much.
He joined during the two years I was away, right?
I feel like he is always been there...
Not much of a presence, I guess.
Juvia will go look for them.
Then I will go as well.
But Juvia wanted to go cheer on Gray-sama!
Those who are Men should not run from their enemies!
What do you think you are doing?!
That thing from before was a tactic to throw Mira off her guard!
I sure hope you did not start thinking that I had a thing for you!
That was one excellent under-handed plan you thought up.
And I would thought there would not be anyone at this place.
Only members of our guild can enter here.
So this island was controlled by a guild.
You must not get close to me...
What the hell are you saying?
Do not get close to me.
Can we just leave him alone?
Maybe it is a little late, but why are you blue if you are a cat, Happy?
How am I supposed to know that, anyway?
But I am sure there is got to be a reason.
An old passerby told me that everything in this world has meaning, you know.
Not someone important from long ago?
Maybe it is because I am like the bluebird of happiness?
My name is Happy, and I have wings and fly!
Yeah, but you are a cat.
